metadata.auditor: Jane Smith, CISA, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor

controls.description: Information security policy and topic-specific policies
controls.implementation_notes: Basic security policy exists but not regularly reviewed

controls.description: Define and allocate information security responsibilities
controls.implementation_notes: Roles defined informally, no documentation

controls.description: Conflicting duties and areas of responsibility segregated
controls.implementation_notes: Segregation implemented for critical systems only

controls.description: Rules to control physical and logical access to information and information processing facilities
controls.implementation_notes: Basic access control policy, inconsistent enforcement

controls.description: Full life cycle of identities is managed
controls.implementation_notes: Active Directory in use, some manual processes

controls.description: Allocation and management of authentication information
controls.implementation_notes: Password policy exists, no MFA for all users

controls.description: Access rights are provisioned, reviewed and adjusted as needed
controls.implementation_notes: No regular access reviews, manual provisioning

controls.control_name: Information security incident management planning and preparation
controls.description: Plan and prepare for managing information security incidents
controls.implementation_notes: Informal incident response, no documented procedures

controls.control_name: Assessment and decision on information security events
controls.description: Assess information security events and decide if they are to be classified as information security incidents
controls.implementation_notes: No event assessment process defined

controls.description: Respond to information security incidents in accordance with documented procedures
controls.implementation_notes: Ad-hoc response, no playbooks

controls.description: Background verification checks on candidates for employment
controls.implementation_notes: Background checks for all employees, documentation needs improvement

controls.description: Employment contracts state responsibilities for information security
controls.implementation_notes: Generic security clauses, not comprehensive

controls.control_name: Information security awareness, education and training
controls.description: Personnel receive appropriate information security awareness education and training
controls.implementation_notes: Annual security briefing only, no ongoing training

controls.description: Security measures for remote working
controls.implementation_notes: Basic remote work policy, VPN required

controls.description: Provide mechanism for personnel to report observed or suspected information security events
controls.implementation_notes: Email-based reporting, no tracking system

controls.description: Security perimeters defined and used to protect areas containing information and information processing facilities
controls.implementation_notes: Perimeter security in place, monitoring needs enhancement

controls.description: Secure areas protected by appropriate entry controls
controls.implementation_notes: Badge access system with audit logs

controls.description: Clear desk rules for papers and removable storage media and clear screen rules for information processing facilities
controls.implementation_notes: Policy exists but compliance is low

controls.description: Information stored on, processed by or accessible via user endpoint devices
controls.implementation_notes: Endpoint protection deployed, mobile device management partial

controls.description: Allocation and use of privileged access rights restricted and managed
controls.implementation_notes: Privileged accounts exist but no PAM solution

controls.description: Secure authentication technologies and procedures
controls.implementation_notes: MFA for VPN only, not for internal systems

controls.description: Protection against malware is implemented and supported by appropriate user awareness
controls.implementation_notes: Enterprise antivirus deployed and monitored

controls.description: Information about technical vulnerabilities is obtained, exposure is evaluated, and measures are taken
controls.implementation_notes: Manual patching, no vulnerability scanning

controls.description: Configurations including security configurations of hardware, software, services and networks established, documented, implemented, monitored and reviewed
controls.implementation_notes: Basic configuration documentation, no baseline enforcement

controls.description: Backup copies of information, software and systems maintained and regularly tested
controls.implementation_notes: Daily backups, restore testing quarterly

controls.description: Logs that record activities, exceptions, faults and other relevant events generated, stored and protected
controls.implementation_notes: Basic logging enabled, no centralized log management

controls.description: Networks, systems and applications monitored for anomalous behaviour
controls.implementation_notes: No SIEM, manual log review only

controls.description: Networks and network devices secured, managed and controlled
controls.implementation_notes: Firewalls deployed, network segmentation partial

controls.description: Rules for the effective use of cryptography defined and implemented
controls.implementation_notes: Encryption for data at rest, in transit needs standardization

controls.description: Rules for the secure development of software and systems established and applied
controls.implementation_notes: No formal SDLC security integration

controls.control_name: Security testing in development and acceptance
controls.description: Security testing processes defined and implemented in the development life cycle
controls.implementation_notes: No security testing process
